subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] DRV's
author: juli velazquez
full_text:
--0-192207040-1202508644=:26027
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Frank, good files.  They know you so well, with the response about you testing the boxes.  The second file was so clear, not static at all coming through!~
   
  Juli

Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
           A couple voices from just now testign another car tuner. I have veryu few of these, and out of four I had in the junk box, only two work. These are weak, almost like regular EVP. Rigel is one that comes through every once in awhile, not sure if that his name, or home, as sometimes he says "this is your friend from Rigel"
 
 It's still looking like the sound chamber is completely un needed, and may even hamper the voices. What I get form the Ghostman, and even directly from a tuenr module is easier to understand that the ones through an sound chamber and mic amplifiers. the Gostman in direct mode yields longs, and more coherent voices than the original box, at least compared to what I was getting last night.
Tonight I'll modifiy #32 to get either direct recordings out of the tuner, or through the sound chamber so I can compare.  I had one from 2/5/08 from the Ghostman that said "that Earthquake will occur-------on the island near Chile (Falklands?).  There was a EQ today off Brazil, but no island there.
 
 DRV=direct radio voice
 
 Frank-S
